answers.text:
Hi Donald, 
Here is an economic indicators dash board that the city of Redwood, CA is using. While the report is likely in a different format than yours you can still see what they felt was important and how they are presenting their information. http://icma.org/en/Article/102578/Redwood_City_CA_Unveils_Online_Economic_Indicators_Dashboard
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Donald Gloo
text:
We are reviewing our monthly economic indicators report that is provided to the County Board to ensure that it provides the right mix of information in a format that is easy to use.
If your local government produces an economic indicators report, we'd love to see it.
Please post a copy to the KN, reply to this message, or reply directly to me at dgloo@lakecountyil.gov.
Thanks.
title: Economic Indicators Report for Elected Officials
